front.title: RTCP Extensions for Single-Source Multicast Sessions with Unicast Feedback

abstract.t: This document specifies an extension to the Real-time Transport Control Protocol (RTCP) to use unicast feedback to a multicast sender. The proposed extension is useful for single-source multicast not available or not desired. In addition, it can be applied to any group that might benefit from a sender-controlled summarized reporting mechanism. Ott et al. Internet Draft - Expires Sept 2009 [page 2] RTCP with Unicast Feedback
